articles.title: Our Favorite Dyson Vacuum Is on Sale This Labor Day Weekend for $120 Off
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: CNET tested and awarded the Dyson V15 Detect cordless vacuum cleaner as the best overall Dyson vacuum. The Dyson V15 works great for quick cleanups or deep cleans. The Dyson V15 Detect was awarded CNET's best overall Dyson vacuum, best at finding dust and an Editors' Choice Award.

articles.title: Leaks Reveal New Google Nest Devices With Upgrades: Gemini, 2K Resolution and More
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Google Nest is planning a new generation of products, including indoor/outdoor cams and doorbells, with major updates. The new Nest generation will include a confirmed upgrade to Gemini AI, replacing Google Assistant, and is expected to upgrade all cams to a 2K resolution.

articles.title: A week later with Google Pixel 10, I'm wondering why anyone should buy pricier flagships
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google has officially launched the Pixel 10 smartphone with a starting price of $799. The Pixel 10 features upgrades such as a three-camera system, Google Tensor G5 chipset, improved battery life, and Pixelsnap. The phone maintains the same price as its predecessor, despite the upgrades.

articles.title: Free Google Function: Access Powerful Tool Now!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched VIDS, an AI-powered video creation suite, now available to all Google account holders. VIDS leverages Gemini AI and provides features like automated script creation, visual suggestions, AI-generated voiceovers, and Ki-avatars for creating engaging video content. Google Workspace subscribers get enhanced AI features.

articles.title: I tested three of the best heat protectants to keep your hair healthy – one is a real treat
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: The Inkey List launched new tinted lip balms. Dyson introduced Dyson Omega leave-in conditioning spray, a new heat protectant spray formulated to soften dry hair.

articles.title: I tested three of the best heat protectants to keep your hair healthy – one is a real treat
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Arkive offers The Prologue hair primer, a heat protectant that also detangles, adds shine, and reduces frizz. Ghd provides the Bodyguard heat protect spray which helps maintain hairstyles and leaves no residue. Dyson's newest product is the Omega leave-in conditioning spray, a refillable formula for softening dry hair. The Inkey List launched new tinted lip balms.

articles.title: Upcoming Lenovo Tablets, Motorola Edge 60 Neo, & G06 Series Smartphones Leaked Online
articles.author: Sean
articles.summary: Lenovo is preparing to launch the IdeaPad Plus and Yoga Tab, featuring dual-tone designs, stylus support, and magnetic keyboard accessories. Motorola plans to unveil the Edge 60 Neo, an affordable smartphone with a triple camera setup, along with the Moto G06 and G06 Power, featuring dual rear cameras and diverse color options.

articles.title: Burger King Rolls Out Its Latest Whopper Creation
articles.author: Joe Lombardi
articles.summary: Burger King has launched the Crispy Onion Whopper, a new burger inspired by customer submissions through the 'Whopper by You' platform. This limited-time offering is available in Whopper and Whopper Jr. sizes at participating U.S. restaurants and features a flame-grilled patty with onion rings, crispy onions, bacon, and barbecue sauce.

articles.title: Cubot KingKong 11 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cubot officially announced the KingKong 11 in August 2025, a 5G-ready smartphone featuring a 10200 mAh battery with 33W wired charging. The phone has a 6.72-inch IPS LCD display, Mediatek Dimensity 7025 processor, 16GB RAM, 256GB storage and a 108MP + 8MP dual rear camera setup, and a 32MP front camera.

articles.title: If You're In Your 'Responsibly Irresponsible' Era, These 35 Under-$10 Treats Are The Perfect Solution
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f introduced Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara with tubing technology and Hydrating Core Lip Shine. Essence launched "What the Fake!" Plumping Lip Filler with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E. L'Oréal Paris released BB Cream, an anti-redness moisturizer. Julep's Eyeshadow Crème to Powder Eyeshadow Stick is also a new product with blendable, waterproof features.

articles.title: TechLife Pad Neo Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: TechLife launched the Pad Neo tablet, which features a 10.1-inch IPS LCD display, Unisoc T612 Octa-core processor, 4GB RAM, and storage options of 64GB or 128GB. The tablet also includes an 8-megapixel rear camera, a 5-megapixel front camera, a 6000 mAh battery with 10W wired and 5W reverse wired charging, and it runs on Android 14, with prices starting from P6,366.00.

articles.title: AI Unifies Gadgets: Google's Vision of a Seamless Ecosystem
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is developing an ambient computing ecosystem by updating and connecting its products and services via AI. Key products like Google Assistant, Pixel devices, Nest products, Chromecast with Google TV, Android Automotive, and Wear OS are being integrated with advancements like Matter Protocol and Federated Learning to provide features such as cross-device handoff, contextual awareness, and proactive assistance. These updates and integrations aim to create a personalized and seamless user experience across various devices.

articles.title: Trader Joe's Just Dropped An Uncrustables Dupe That Parents Will Surely Freak Over — Here's Whether Or Not They Stack Up To The Classic
articles.author: Luke Field
articles.summary: Trader Joe's launched their own version of the crustless PB&J, timed with back-to-school month. The Trader Joe's sandwich is vegan and has a square shape. Smucker's Uncrustables are round and known for their very soft bread.

articles.title: Stuck for a gift for dad? These picks start at $10 (and not a sock in sight)
articles.author: Georgie Gordon
articles.summary: Shokz introduced the 'OpenFit 2+' earbuds for $338. Other products listed include the Therabody 'G6 Theragun' massager, Bang & Olufsen 'Beosound Explore' speaker and Puma 'Speedcat OG' sneakers.

articles.title: Trader Joe's New Uncrustables Dupe: Review
articles.author: Luke Field
articles.summary: Trader Joe's introduced their own version of crustless PB&J sandwiches, timed with back-to-school season, which is compared to Smucker's Uncrustables. Trader Joe's version is vegan and comes in square shape while Uncrustables are round. The Trader Joe's sandwich offers a more subtle flavor profile and less sweetness, making it a healthier alternative appealing to adults, unlike Uncrustables which are sweeter and targeted towards children.

articles.title: 21 Back-To-School Products That Make College Exciting
articles.author: Mariel Guzman
articles.summary: This article introduces a range of new products and services aimed at enhancing college dorm life. These include a compact Ninja coffee maker, a two-door mini fridge, an electric hot pot, and a mini air fryer for convenient in-dorm meals and snacks. A small projector for movie nights and a Dreo table fan for personal cooling are also highlighted.

articles.title: 'Going to sell like hotcakes': First reviews of Nvidia Jetson AGX Thor Developer Kit leaves me with no doubt - Nvidia has a sleeper hit on its hands
articles.author: Wayne Williams
articles.summary: Nvidia recently launched the Jetson AGX Thor Developer Kit, a $3,499 platform designed for robotics and edge AI development. The kit includes the Jetson T5000 module with a Blackwell architecture, 128GB of LPDDR5x memory, and 1TB of storage and has received positive initial reviews praising its compute power and capabilities for running large AI models.

articles.title: Tesla Model Y performance revealed, offers a range of 579 km on full charge
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Tesla has unveiled the 'Model Y Performance', an electric sedan boasting increased power and design enhancements. The vehicle features 'Performance 4DU' motors, achieving 0-60 mph in 3.3 seconds with a top speed of 155 mph. It incorporates a 'high-density' battery cell providing a range of approximately 360 miles and features a 16-inch touchscreen display.

articles.title: LG unveils 2025 OLEDevo and QNEDevo TVs with advanced AI features
articles.author: Tribune Web Desk
articles.summary: LG Electronics India has launched its 2025 OLEDevo and QNEDevo TV line-up in India. These televisions are powered by LG's Alpha AI Processor Gen2, offering personalized experiences and improved picture, sound, and interactivity. The new AI Magic Remote features AI button for voice recognition and seamless navigation. The TV greets users personally through 'AI Welcome' and identifies individual voices using 'AI Voice ID'.

articles.title: The 20+ Best Labor Day Washer And Dryer Sales: Up To 38% Off Top Picks
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, GE, and Whirlpool are offering significant discounts on their top-rated washer and dryer models during Labor Day sales.

articles.title: Dyson's best-tested vacuums and fans just dropped to new low prices for Labor Day
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on a range of products for Labor Day, including vacuums like the V8 Absolute, V15 Detect, and Gen5outsize, as well as air purifiers and hair tools such as the Airwrap and Supersonic hair dryer.  The sale includes the Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP1, marking the first discount since its launch, and discounts on the Airwrap i.d. Straight + Wavy tool, with savings matching previous Prime Day offers.

articles.title: The Audi A5 – a beautiful rebellion against SUV monopoly
articles.author: Melinda Ferguson
articles.summary: Audi introduced the all-new Audi A5 sedan.

articles.title: Major supermarket trials AI trolleys in UK first to help customers shop
articles.author: Epping Forest Guardian
articles.summary: Waitrose is currently trialling AI-powered trolleys. This marks the first time such technology is being tested in a UK supermarket chain.

articles.title: Best Labor Day Washer And Dryer Sales 2025
articles.author: Bridget Chapman
articles.summary: Samsung, LG, and Electrolux are offering discounts on their washer and dryer models for Labor Day. Specifically, the Samsung Front-Load Washer And Gas Dryer Set is 38% off, the LG Turbowash Stackable Smart Front-Load Washer is over $450 off, and an Electrolux electric dryer model is also on sale with discounts.

articles.title: 'I wake at night so I tried Simba's cool touch pillow to see if it's worth the price'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Simba launched the Hybrid Pillow, retailing for £109, designed with down-like cushioning and height and firmness adjustable features using Nanocube core filling. The pillow incorporates Stratos 'cool-touch' tech for temperature regulation. The product is available for purchase on Simba's website.

articles.title: Upgrade Your Kitchen Without Breaking The Bank: 41 Items That'll Transform Your Cookspace
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of new products designed to organize, clean, and modernize kitchens. These include under-cabinet lights, stainless steel cleaner, can racks, mug organizers, cooktop cleaning kits, stove burner covers, appliance touch-up paint, magnetic stove shelves, and various other items for cabinet and drawer organization and protection.

articles.title: Youth Economy Agency Launches YEA Marketplace Platform
articles.author: Vp Digital
articles.summary: The Youth Economy Agency (YEA) has launched the YEA Marketplace Platform, a new online platform designed to connect Saint Lucian youth entrepreneurs with global markets. The platform enables YEA clients to create virtual stores to showcase their products and services. The launch ceremony was held on August 27, 2025.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Appliances getting smarter to make life easier
articles.author: Ian Shantz
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, and Whirlpool are introducing new smart appliances. These include the LG QuadWash Pro Dishwasher (controlled via the LG ThinQ app), the Samsung F90 Series Bespoke AI Front Load Washer with AI Fabric Sensing (with SmartThings app integration), the Samsung 36-inch Counter-Depth Side by Side Refrigerator with Family Hub, and the Whirlpool 5.0 Cu. Ft. Single Smart Wall Oven with Air Fry (manageable via a smartphone app and smart speaker).

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Appliances getting smarter to make life easier
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: LG is offering smart appliances that integrate with the LG ThinQ app, enabling users to remotely control and monitor devices like dishwashers, refrigerators, and ranges. The LG QuadWash Pro Dishwasher family features app control, high-pressure jets, and a 'Dynamic Dry' feature. Compatible fridges and ranges, such as the LG Counter-Depth MAX Refrigerator and the LG Induction Slide-in Range, can be controlled via voice commands or the ThinQ app.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Appliances getting smarter to make life easier
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: LG's QuadWash Pro Dishwasher family is controlled via the LG ThinQ app, and the LG Counter-Depth MAX Refrigerator can make craft ice while the LG Induction Slide-in Range features Air Fry and Air Sous Vide. Samsung's F90 Series Bespoke AI Front Load Washer offers AI Fabric Sensing and integrates with the SmartThings app. Whirlpool's 5.0 Cu. Ft. Single Smart Wall Oven with Air Fry receives automatic updates and works with a smartphone app and smart speakers.

articles.title: The Perfect Two-Minute Wellness Addition for Your Shower
articles.author: Roxanne Adamiyatt
articles.summary: The author recommends Nerra exfoliating gloves for their effectiveness in skin sloughing and lymphatic drainage. The gloves come in two options (black for thorough sloughing, white for gentle exfoliation), are easy to clean, and are made of biodegradable material. The author highlights the product's ability to streamline personal care routines.

articles.title: Yahoo! Japan: Content Writing Service for European Economic Area (EEA) and UK Customers Only-No Virtual Assistance Provided
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: A content writing service is launched, specializing in crafting localized content for Yahoo! Japan targeting Japanese consumers. This service creates product descriptions, blog posts, website copy, category pages, landing pages, and Yahoo! Japan News articles. It is offered exclusively to clients in the European Economic Area (EEA) and the United Kingdom (UK).

articles.title: I'm really impressed with this $400 portable projector
articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.summary: Lumi Labs has launched the Lumi Max, a portable projector featuring Google TV integration, autofocus, obstacle avoidance, and a display size of 40-120 inches with 1080p full HD resolution and 4K UHD compatibility. The projector is priced around $400 and is available for purchase. Lumi Labs will also launch a 'Lumi IQ' mobile app that features an AI assistant, allowing users to control the projector with their voice.

articles.title: I'm really impressed with this $400 portable projector
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Lumi Labs recently launched the Lumi Max, a portable projector designed for small spaces and travel. This projector runs on Google TV, offering access to a wide range of apps, movies, TV shows, and free live TV channels. Its compact design and included carrying case make it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL vs. Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: Software savvy up against raw performance
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL features a 6.8-inch Super Actua display and Qi2 compatibility. Google focused on the user experience and improved Gemini. Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra has a 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED panel with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

articles.title: Xpeng unveils lower than expected price for sleek P7
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: Xpeng officially announced the pricing of its new tech-driven P7 model, starting at $A47,000 in China. The P7 features Xpeng's 800V architecture with ultra-fast charging and comes with options for both short-range and long-range battery packs, also it completed a 24-hour endurance test and is slated to debut at the IAA show in Europe.

articles.title: I replaced my Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra with the Pixel 10 Pro XL for a ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google's flagship phones feature a seamless integration of AI into everyday apps.

articles.title: Phone go for a swim? How to save your soaking smartphone.
articles.author: Cody Godwin
articles.summary: The article references several products that could be relevant for smartphone users. These include the Apple AirTag 4-Pack, the Casekoo Crystal Clear Protective Case, Yootech Wireless Charger, Ailun Glass Screen Protector, Portable Charger with Built-In Charging Cables, Beam Electronics Phone Holder, Aureday Phone Tripod, Anker 6 Foot USB-C Cable, Pack of 2, and Remote Control Outlet. The article suggests these products as solutions or helpful devices.

articles.title: Leaks Reveal New Google Nest Devices With Upgrades: Gemini, 2K Resolution and More
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Google is planning a major update to its Nest home security line. The update includes upgrades to Nest Cams to 2K resolution and Nest Doorbell, a new smart speaker with 360-degree sound, and a new subscription model called Google Home Premium. It also brings the Gemini AI to the Google Home ecosystem to replace the Google Assistant.

articles.title: Everything Branding Launches AEO Growth Program to Secure AI-Recognized Press
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Everything Branding launched its AEO Growth Program, a service designed to help brands dominate Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), AI-driven search visibility, and LLM-powered product recommendations. The program helps brands strategically secure press placements that are indexed and referenced by AI-driven search engines, ensuring maximum online visibility.

articles.title: 29 Genius Home Products That Solve Everyday Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced to solve everyday household problems. These include detergent cup holders to prevent spills, plastic bag holders for organization, double shower hooks for easy curtain changes, bed bands to keep sheets in place, and unbreakable plates for families. Other items presented are light-dimming stickers, Swedish dishcloths, door pinch guards, Snug Plugs, lawn repair formulas, crack weeder tool, couch guards, socket covers, stove gap fillers, bedsheet tags, plant cleaning wipes, ceiling fan carbon filters, 3D-printed straw holders, towel clips, WD-40 pen, litter box enclosure, storage bag, duvet cover helper, quick-dry stone mat, bathroom sink cover, toothbrush sanitizer, dishwasher indicator, bulb changer, and food savers.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Amoled 2 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Blaze Amoled 2 smartphone on August 7, 2025, and released it on August 16, 2025. This 5G-ready phone features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, a Mediatek Dimensity 7060 processor, 6GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, a 50MP main camera, and an 8MP front camera, and is powered by a 5000 mAh battery with 33W wired charging running on Android 15.

articles.title: Best Washing Machines for Your Home in 2025
articles.author: Pamela Vachon
articles.summary: GE offers a top-tier, front-loading washing machine model with high customer satisfaction and numerous available features. This model is positioned as a premium option with comprehensive capabilities for consumers comparing washing machine features.

articles.title: 30 Items To Help You Convert To The Carry-On Only Life
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Alleyoop introduced the Pen Pal, a 4-in-1 makeup tool combining lip liner, brow pencil, eyeliner, and highlighter. Subtl Beauty offers the Beauty Stack, a customizable set allowing up to nine makeup products in one compact. A 3-in-1 foldable wireless charging pad simplifies charging for iPhones, Apple Watches, and AirPods, catering to travelers.

articles.title: ‘Midway wine' isn't red, white, rosé or orange — and it's perfect for September
articles.author: Rob Buckhaven
articles.summary: Aldi's Roseorange launched a new category of wines called 'midway wine,' which blends red and white grapes. This hybrid rosé-orange wine offers a unique flavor profile, bridging the gap between rosé and orange wines, with textured flavors of quince, orange pith, and Mirabelle plum skin.

articles.title: **Maximize Savings at Amazon, Walmart, and Beyond: How Content Writing Can Boost Your Earnings**
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The content highlights the importance of optimized product descriptions for e-commerce businesses using platforms like Amazon and Walmart to improve sales. A small online retailer selling ergonomic office chairs experienced a 25% increase in sales after optimizing their product descriptions using relevant keywords such as 'ergonomic chair' and 'office chair with lumbar support'.

articles.title: 2023 Genesis Electrified G80
articles.author: Blair Travers
articles.summary: The 2023 Genesis Electrified G80 is introduced as a luxury electric car with an all-electric drivetrain, Nappa leather upholstery and a suite of advanced safety tech. Its dual-motor setup delivers instant torque, a combined 365 horsepower, and an EPA-estimated range of 282 miles. The model comes in Prestige trim, equipped with features like a 14.5-inch touch screen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a 21-speaker Lexicon premium audio system.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Labor Day Weekend Means End-Of-Summer Fun, Celebrations, And Some Not-Business-As Usual Updates
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, positioning it as America's best mobile network, according to Ookla Speedtest. T-Mobile offers its services from its store located near North Branford. This investment aims to provide better connectivity and service to communities.

articles.title: Claude.AI teaches users ins, outs of programming code
articles.summary: Skechers launched "Find My Skechers," children's sneakers with a hidden compartment for an Apple AirTag tracker priced between $52 and $58. Velocity Micro introduced the ProMagixTraderPro computer, designed for stock market professionals, capable of handling information on eight screens, starting at $2,000.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Sea Level Rise Committee Meeting and 11 more events
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to enhance its network, and according to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile possesses America's best mobile network in the US. The company supports communities like New Shoreham by helping them stay connected.

articles.title: Is Dyson's £60 leave-in conditioner worth the investment?
articles.author: Melissa Twigg
articles.summary: Dyson has expanded its hair care line with the launch of the Dyson Omega Leave-In Conditioner (£59) and Dyson Omega Hair Oil (£46), joining their existing styling sprays and serums. These new products, enriched with sunflower oil from Dyson's farms, aim to provide moisture, smoothness, and frizz reduction. Dyson emphasizes the scientific backing and quality of these products, positioning them as premium solutions in the hair care market.

articles.title: Sarah Carey: The joy of texts? Barrage of new scam alerts has just left me with a sense of paranoia
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Assuming the article continues by stating that a customer ordered a new 'SmartSpatula' from 'KitchenGizmo Inc.' six weeks ago and encountered a malfunction. The article further describes how KitchenGizmo Inc. launched a firmware update to address the issue.

articles.title: Germany on HBO Max: A Comprehensive Overview of Content
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery is planning to launch HBO Max (now Max) in Germany, seeking a suitable distribution partner to navigate local regulations. The service is expected to offer HBO Originals, Warner Bros. Blockbusters, Max Originals, Discovery+ content, and localized German content. A tiered subscription model with options for 4K streaming and multiple device access is anticipated to compete with existing streaming services like Netflix and Amazon Prime Video.

articles.title: Japan launches QR codes to locate the nearest vacant restrooms
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Toto launched a service enabling users to find the nearest public restrooms and check their real-time occupancy using their phones. This service helps people locate available washrooms quickly.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Shoppers Food to close Westminster location this fall
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Spirit Halloween is opening a new store in Westminster on September 1st as part of a larger expansion of 21 stores across Maryland. Conversely, Shoppers Food will close four Maryland locations, including the Westminster store, by October 11, 2025.

articles.title: Best Foundations for Flawless, Long-Lasting Coverage
articles.summary: Lakmé launched 9To5 Primer+Matte Perfect Cover Long-Lasting Mini Foundation, a compact foundation with full coverage and a matte finish. Bobbi Brown introduced Weightless Skin SPF 15 Foundation, a lightweight, buildable foundation with medium coverage. Smashbox released Always On Skin-Balancing Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid, a long-wearing foundation that hydrates and balances skin with medium-to-full coverage. Huda Beauty unveiled Easy Blur Natural Airbrush Lightweight Foundation, a buildable, lightweight formula designed to blur imperfections. M.A.C presented Studio Radiance Serum-Powered Hydrating Foundation, a serum-powered foundation that hydrates and gives a radiant glow.

articles.title: Best Amazon Lipsticks for Long-Lasting Color and Everyday Glam
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a range of lipsticks featuring various formulations like paraben-free matte, ultra-hydrating satin matte, organic semi-matte, and feather-light matte bullet. These lipsticks boast features like rich pigments, smooth textures, hydrating formulas, long-lasting wear, and suitability for diverse skin tones. IDPL promotes these products, potentially earning a commission on sales.

articles.title: Best Amazon Liquid Eyeliners for Bold, Long-Lasting Eye Makeup
articles.summary: Amazon offers a range of liquid eyeliners designed for precision and lasting wear. These include quick-drying glossy eyeliners with fine tips, waterproof smudge-proof eyeliners with an HD gloss finish, jet black matte eyeliners with a water-resistant finish, and high-pigment vegan eyeliners.

articles.title: Boots shoppers praise 'excellent value' star gift for men reduced to £20
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Boots is promoting gift sets on a weekly rotation, featuring a full men's skincare routine from Bulldog for £20.50, typically priced at £44. LookFantastic offers 20% off the RITUALS Homme Collection Men's Aromatic Mini Bath and Body Set, and Boots stocks the Ted Baker Men's Everyday Event Duo for £18. The Bulldog set includes shower gel, shampoo, shave gel and razor, moisturiser, styling salt spray and deodorant.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's new massage gun and it's a game-changer
articles.author: Patrick Glover
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Reka Fitness Massage Gun as part of its Specialbuys Fitness Range. Priced at £19.99, the massage gun includes four interchangeable massage heads and is designed for muscle recovery and warm-up. The device is lightweight, easy to use, and features a long battery life and variable speeds.

articles.title: Sainsbury's, Aldi, M&S and Jason's sourdough bread compared
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: M&S offers a sourdough loaf priced at £4.25, noted for its lovely crunch and chewy texture. Aldi's sourdough, costing £1.75, is considered less impressive and similar to regular bread. Sainsbury's sells a sourdough loaf for £4, which has a slightly salty aftertaste but makes crunchy toast, while Jason's offers a sourdough and ciabatta combination loaf for £2.

articles.title: Zellers returns — again — this time starting in Edmonton
articles.author: Anis Heydari
articles.summary: Zellers is launching a new store at Londonderry Mall in north Edmonton. The soft launch, initially planned for August 29th, has been postponed to early September. The store, spanning approximately 60,000 square feet, will offer household goods and clothing for men, women, and children.

articles.title: HTC's VIVE Eagle AI glasses seeing great demand in preorder sales: Distributor
articles.author: Enditem/cs
articles.summary: HTC launched the Vive Eagle AI glasses on August 14th, which are now available in Taiwan on September 1st for NT$15,600. The glasses feature AI integration, a 12-megapixel camera, and support multiple languages. Taiwan Mobile offers a 5G subscription plan, and the glasses are expected to boost HTC's revenue.

articles.title: From Italy to the Philippines: Candy Introduces a New Era of "Smart, Efficient, Simple" Living Solutions
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, is launching its products in the Philippines, starting with its water heater line. The company plans to expand its offerings to include washing machines and refrigerators. Candy aims to provide smart, efficient, and simple solutions tailored to Filipino consumers.

articles.title: Get up to 1.5 million Naira in the Geely pre-sales offer
articles.author: Pulse
articles.summary: Geely is offering up to 1.5 million Naira in a pre-sales promotion. This indicates an upcoming introduction or launch of Geely products.

articles.title: 33 Products Reviewers Absolutely Rave About
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream with Q10. E.l.f Cosmetics released Lash Xtndr tubing mascara as an alternative to lash extensions. L'Oréal Paris has a new green-tinted anti-redness BB cream.

articles.title: Apple and Windows users urged to use free feature to stop hacking
articles.author: Sophie Buchan
articles.summary: McAfee, Norton, and Avast often provide trial versions of their antivirus software pre-installed on new computers. Users may need to pay or register to continue using these products after the trial period expires.

articles.title: 33 "Where Have You Been All My Life?"-Worthy Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Sally Hansen introduced Insta-Dri nail polish for quick touch-ups. Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Biofreeze released a new Dry Stick for portable pain relief, while Death Wish introduced Instant Coffee Packets. E.l.f. launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara and Built released "Puff Protein Bars".

articles.title: Simplify laundry days with the 10 high capacity washing machines: Top picks from popular brands
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: The article introduces several high-capacity washing machines from brands like Samsung, Bosch, Voltas Beko, LG, Godrej, IFB and Haier, detailing their features, technology and consumer reviews. Each product is introduced with its key specifications, highlighting unique selling points such as AI-driven cleaning, energy efficiency, specialized wash programs, and smart features for improved convenience and efficiency.

articles.title: Australians in London taste test M&S lamingtons: ‘A cubed cake does not a lamington make'
articles.author: Rose Johnstone
articles.summary: M&S Food has launched two new lamington variations: Chocolate & Coconut Lamingtons and Caramelised Biscuit Lamingtons, both priced at £4 for two. The Chocolate & Coconut version features buttermilk-enriched chocolate sponge, chocolate sauce, coconut flakes, buttercream, and jam.  The Caramelised Biscuit Lamingtons include a similar chocolate sponge, chocolate sauce, caramelised biscuit crumb, buttercream, and salted caramel sauce.

articles.title: 31 Items To Solve "The Bane Of Your Existence" Problems
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: This content introduces a diverse range of new health and personal care products designed to address specific needs and improve well-being. These products include solutions for foot care, dandruff, ear cleaning, post-sex cleanup, fungal nail renewal, denture cleaning, skin exfoliation, blackhead removal, wart treatment, dark spot removal, hair care, sweat absorption, anti-friction, odor removal, pelvic floor exercise, acne treatment, breath freshening, shoe deodorizing, earbud cleaning, keratosis pilaris, nose hair removal, tonsil stone removal, toilet odor control, incontinence, skin conditions, hair removal, and oral hygiene. Each product offers a unique approach to solving common issues, from the Squatty Potty's colon-opening position to SweatBlock's antiperspirant wipes for hyperhidrosis.
